briefdescription.para: Chooses whether to ignore the actual noexcept-ness of std::tuple implementstion and make some reasonable assumptions instead.
Disables all checks to achieve better performance.

memberdef.name: BOOST_STATIC_VIEWS_BUG_MESSAGE
memberdef.initializer: "Congratulations, you've found a bug in the StaticViews " \ "library! Please, be so kind to submit here " \ "https://github.com/BoostGSoC17/static-views/issues."

memberdef.name: BOOST_STATIC_VIEWS_DECLTYPE_NOEXCEPT_RETURN
BOOST_STATIC_VIEWS_INLINE_VARIABLE
memberdef.initializer: inline namespace { \ constexpr auto const& name = \ ::BOOST_STATIC_VIEWS_NAMESPACE::_static_const<type>; \ } \
